did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Stereographs of miscellaneous Virginia sites ca. 1860-1900
did.physdesc: This collections consists of three items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Stereographs of miscellaneous Virginia sites, ca. 1860-1900, Accession # 10810, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The photographs were purchased by the Library from Krainik Gallery Vintage Photographs, Falls Church, Virginia, on January 6, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These three stereoscopic photographs of Virginia scenes, ca. 1860-1900, include stereoviews of the Old Colonial Church, Hampton, Virginia, published by Alfred S. Campbell, Elizabeth, New Jersey, dated 1896; Blanford Church built 1720, Petersburg, Virginia, published by Kilburn Brothers, Littleton, New Hampshire, ca. 1870's; and War Views of Falls Church, Virginia, negative by Mathew Brady, and published by E.& H.T. Anthony, New York, ca. 1860's.
